Summary: This comprehensive survey advances understanding in LLM evaluation, morphological dynamics, and acoustic source localization through a well-integrated interdisciplinary approach. Recommendations: Add more summary tables and figures to reinforce key ideas.; Increase acoustic source localization detail for balance.; Improve transitions for seamless reading experience.
